name: webSearch_tool_123
description: Performs a web search and returns relevant summaries.
- query (String, required): search term or question.
- includeDomains (Array of String, optional): list of domains to restrict search to.
- excludeDomains (Array of String, optional): list of domains to exclude.
- numResults (Number, optional): number of results to return (default 3).
Use this tool when the user requests to search the web or find information within or outside specific domains.
